description:
A girl who introduced as Kazuya friend`s girlfriend.
She came from another rental girlfriend agency. She wanted to date with Kazuya because she saw his kindness toward Chizuru. Actually she has an illness which she has to monitor her heartbeat all the time. Her doctor said "If your heart beat peaks over 100 BPM, you may die." And Kazuya is the first one who can make her heart beat fast as she expectation.
name: Sarashina Ruka
